title.narrative: Strengthening the capacity of the Association of Liberian Universities to alleviate poverty through Entrepreneurship Cur

description.narrative:
Outputs: ALU Secretariat staff acquired additional training and skills and can write projects and provide content support to educational institutions on entrepreneurship development. Programmmes and courses developed; education material ready and instructional staff trained (5 per institution) Market research done for entrepreneurship development
Outcomes: ALU Secretariat is skilled with the expertise to execute its responsibilities in a professional manner ALU member universities have the capacity to develop and teach entrepreneurship curricula modules to their teaching staff and students, learn from practice, and re-adjust curricula when necessary The ALU and its members have the capacity to promote and advocate for entrepreneurship development through conferences, forums, media appearances, etc.

The overarching objective of this project is to build the institutional capacities of the Association of Liberian Universities and its members in their development of entrepreneurship programmes for students of the education institutions.

mailing-address.narrative: Association of Liberian Universities Capital Hill, RM 2-16 University of Liberia Main Campus, GD Building, RM 2-16, Capital Hill, Monrovia-Liberia MONROVIA Liberia
